pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Essentials with R // Allows the reenactment of the R programs used in the book Bayesian Essentials with R without further programming. R code being available as well, they can be modified by the user to conduct one's own simulations. Marin J.-M. and Robert C. P. (2014) doi:10.1007/978-1-4614-8687-9.
